snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner and his Republican leadership team are developing their principles as a counterpoint to legislation that passed last year in the Senate.
abstract: House Speaker John A Boehner tells his members at a closed-door conference that he and his Republican leadership team are preparing to release their principles for an overhaul of the nation's immigration laws.
lead_paragraph: Speaker John A. Boehner and his Republican leadership team are developing their principles as a counterpoint to legislation that passed last year in the Senate.

headline.main: House Republicans Preparing Plan for Immigration Overhaul
headline.print_headline: House Republicans Prepare Counterpoints for Immigration Overhaul
